description: Course where you have the first approach to discrete mathematics, including propositional logic, sets, demonstrations and various tools of logical reasoning. As the teacher's assistant, doubts are solved on all topics and the various activities are graded.

Course where the problem of persistence is addressed, the fundamentals of the relational model are studied, SQL is learned and the modeling of systems is reinforced considering multiple business rules.
